entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy introduces himself to Harry and Ron.

relationships.description: Harry is introduced as Crabbe's classmate.
Harry is introduced as Goyle's classmate.
Harry is introduced as Malfoy's classmate.
Ron gives a slight cough, which might have been hiding a snigger, indicating he dislikes Malfoy.
Malfoy looks down on the Weasley family, saying they have red hair, freckles and more children than they can afford.
